entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
